ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: Authors would like to acknowledge the Department of Bioinformatics and the Center facility of School of Biotechnology that is created by the support of UGC-SAP, MHRD-RUSA, DST-FIST, PURSE grants, University of Jammu, for their support to carry out the research work and Instrumentation division, CSIR-IIIM-Jammu, J&K (India).
